v8:item.v8:content: Amount of the payment made by order, in the contract currency
Сумма произведенной оплаты по заказу, в валюте договора

Settings.QueryText: SELECT CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.Posted AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus <> VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) THEN CASE WHEN RunSchedule.Order IS NULL AND TimeSchedulePlan.Order IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed THEN 2 ELSE 0 END ELSE CASE WHEN ISNULL(RunSchedule.Completed, 0) = 0 AND ISNULL(TimeSchedulePlan.Completed, 0) = 0 THEN CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND Not DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed THEN CASE WHEN Not RunSchedule.Order IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 6 WHEN Not RunSchedule.Order IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 4 ELSE 2 END ELSE 2 END ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND Not DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed THEN CASE WHEN Not RunSchedule.Order IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 5 WHEN Not RunSchedule.Order IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 3 ELSE 1 END ELSE 1 END END END ELSE 2 END AS ShipmentPictureNumber, CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.Posted THEN CASE WHEN (DocumentPurchaseOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) OR ISNULL(PaymentEvent.Amount, 0) <> 0) AND ISNULL(PaymentEvent.PaymentAmount, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AdvanceAmount, 0) = 0 THEN CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.SchedulePayment AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND Not DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed AND Not PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 6 WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 4 ELSE 2 END ELSE 2 END WHEN ISNULL(PaymentEvent.Amount, 0) <= ISNULL(PaymentEvent.PaymentAmount, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AdvanceAmount, 0) THEN CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed THEN 2 ELSE 0 END ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.SchedulePayment AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND Not DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed AND Not PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 5 WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 3 ELSE 1 END ELSE 1 END END ELSE 2 END AS PaymentPictureNumber, CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.Posted AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.DocumentAmount > 0 THEN CAST((ISNULL(PaymentEvent.PaymentAmount, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AdvanceAmount, 0)) * 100 / DocumentPurchaseOrder.DocumentAmount AS NUMBER(15, 2)) ELSE 0 END AS PaymentPercentage, CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.Posted AND Not DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND Not RunSchedule.Order IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS PastPerformance, CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.Posted AND Not DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.SchedulePayment AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND Not PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment IS NULL AND PaymentSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS OverduePayment, CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.Posted AND Not DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND Not RunSchedule.Order IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN TRUE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.Posted AND Not DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.SchedulePayment AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND Not PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment IS NULL AND PaymentSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS ForToday, CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.Posted AND Not DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS OrderInProcess, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Ref, DocumentPurchaseOrder.DeletionMark, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Number, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Date, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Posted, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Company, DocumentPurchaseOrder.OperationKind, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Counterparty, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Counterparty.ContactPerson AS ContactPerson, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Contract, DocumentPurchaseOrder.ReceiptDate AS ReceiptDate, DocumentPurchaseOrder.DocumentCurrency, DocumentPurchaseOrder.AmountIncludesVAT, DocumentPurchaseOrder.IncludeVATInPrice, DocumentPurchaseOrder.ExchangeRate, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Multiplicity, DocumentPurchaseOrder.StructuralUnitReserve, DocumentPurchaseOrder.CustomerOrder, DocumentPurchaseOrder.DocumentAmount, DocumentPurchaseOrder.CounterpartyPriceKind, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Event, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Responsible, DocumentPurchaseOrder.StructuralUnit, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Comment, DocumentPurchaseOrder.SchedulePayment, DocumentPurchaseOrder.PettyCash, DocumentPurchaseOrder.BankAccount, DocumentPurchaseOrder.CashAssetsType, DocumentPurchaseOrder.OrderState, DocumentPurchaseOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus AS OrderStateState, CASE WHEN (DocumentPurchaseOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) OR DocumentPurchaseOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess)) AND Not DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed THEN "In process" ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Completed) THEN "Completed" ELSE "Canceled" END END AS OrderStatus, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed, DocumentPurchaseOrder.IncomingDocumentNumber, DocumentPurchaseOrder.IncomingDocumentDate, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Author, DocumentPurchaseOrder.PointInTime, ISNULL(PaymentEvent.Amount, 0) - ISNULL(PaymentEvent.PaymentAmount, 0) - ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AdvanceAmount, 0) AS ForPayment, ISNULL(PaymentEvent.PaymentAmount, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AdvanceAmount, 0) AS PaymentAmountTurnover FROM Document.PurchaseOrder AS DocumentPurchaseOrder LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrderFulfillmentSchedule AS RunSchedule ON DocumentPurchaseOrder.Ref = RunSchedule.Order AND (RunSchedule.Period <= &CurrentDateSession) LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrderFulfillmentSchedule AS TimeSchedulePlan ON DocumentPurchaseOrder.Ref = TimeSchedulePlan.Order AND (TimeSchedulePlan.Period > &CurrentDateSession) {LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrdersPaymentSchedule AS PaymentSchedule ON DocumentPurchaseOrder.Ref = PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment AND (PaymentSchedule.Period <= &CurrentDateSession)} LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrdersPaymentFact AS PaymentEvent ON DocumentPurchaseOrder.Ref = PaymentEvent.InvoiceForPayment
